Content.Text: Hellooo! <MYNAME>, you home? It's me, Fritz!
Hello. It's Klaus. Do you have a moment?
Yoooo! <MYNAME>, are you in?

Salutations! It's me, Mistel. I'm sorry to drop by
unannounced, but do you have a moment to
spare?
Hi. Got a minute?

Hi there. I'm usually not one to barge in, but do
you have a minute?

I know you are home, <MYNAME>. You wouldn't
leave a lady waiting outside, would you?
Hello there. It's me, Iris. Do you have a minute?

Hi! I hate to drop in on you like this, but do you
have a minute?

Heya! I'd like to talk to you for a minute. Can you
come out, please?

Greetings. It's Angela. I'm terribly sorry to disturb
you, but I have something I would like to give
you.

Heeeeeeeeeey...you in there? Can you come out
for a second?

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Today's White Day, right? So I brought you a
present! I hope you like it.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
I thought I might drop by and give you your
White Day present. I hope you like it.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Today's White Day, after all. I brought a present
for you.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Do you know what today is?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>It's White Day, of course, and so I've brought a
present for you. I hope you like it.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Today's White Day, y'know. Here, I got somethin'
for ya.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Since today's White Day, I thought I'd surprise
you with a heartfelt present.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Here is your present. Why the funny look? You
do remember that today is Valentine's Day,
correct?

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Since today's Valentine's Day...here. A little
something from me to you.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Since today's Valentine's Day and all, I brought
you a present! I hope you like it.

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Today's Valentine's Day, so I just wanted to stop
by and give you something.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I brought a Valentine's Day present for you. Here
it is.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
H-here. I got somethin' for you for Valentine's
Day. I hope you like it.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
I worked really hard to make that, too! It's my
way of sayin' thanks for everything. See ya!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
It's home-made, too! I put everything I could
muster into it, so I hope you enjoy it.
<PAGE>
See ya!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I made it as best I could, in thanks for all that
you've done for me. I...think it's okay. It should
be. Maybe. If it's not, sorry!
<PAGE>
See ya!

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
I tried to make it only mildly sweet. But if it is
still too sweet, just think that it's flavored by my
gratitude to you.
<PAGE>
I look forward to another year spending time in
your company.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I know you'll enjoy it, but no overindulging,
okay? Well then, I look forward to another year
of your pleasant company.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
You are always such a wonderful help, I thought
I'd give you these as thanks. Please feel free to
share them with the family.
<PAGE>
Now then, I must be going.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I whipped these up for you. I hope you like
them.
<PAGE>
Anyway, I've gotta mosey on. Stop by the
restaurant sometime, okay?

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I made my best just for you, <MYNAME>. Let
me know what you think once you've tried them.
<PAGE>
Anyway, I've gotta mosey on. Stop by the
restaurant sometime, okay?

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Don't hog 'em all for yourself, though. Share
some with <CHARANAME0>, too.  Anyway, I'd
better go. See ya later.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
You...are aware of the meaning behind White
Day, correct? That's good.
<PAGE>
Well then, I'll be on my way.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I look forward to another year of your pleasant
company.
<PAGE>
...Well then, I must be going.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Thank you very much for everything. Please give
my best to <CHARANAME0>, as well.
<PAGE>
Now then, I must be going.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
I tried to put what I feel into these, since, you
know, I'm not so hot with words. I hope you
understand.
<PAGE>
Later.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Hey...thanks for everything. You know what I
mean.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Here. I really am thankful for all your support.
Later, then.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Think of this as a token of my thanks, if you
know what I mean. Ciao, babe.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
At first, I thought I'd share these around, but I
think I'll give 'em all to you. I'm not that fond of
sweets, after all.
<PAGE>
Don't eat them all at once, okay? I don't want
you giving yourself a stomachache.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
You're always such a help to me, so I made this
for you in thanks. Share it with your family,
okay?
<PAGE>
See ya later. Say hi to <CHARANAME0> for me,
'kay?

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
This is a token of my thanks. Keep that firmly in
mind when you enjoy it, okay? Good day.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I tried my very best and made this by hand, so
you had better enjoy it. Good day.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
This is a token of my thanks. Enjoy it with your
family, would you? Well then, good day.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The true meaning of a present on Valentine's Day
is...
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>Erm...well, don't think too hard about it, okay? I
simply wanted to try my hand at making a
dessert, is all. 
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Aaaaanyway, I had better be going.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
It's nice to make some sweets every once in a
while. I leveraged all my faux-expertise in making
them, so I hope you like them.
<PAGE>
I'll be on my way, then. Good day.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I made this dessert as a token of my thanks for
all that you have done for me. Please feel free to
enjoy it with your family.
<PAGE>
I had better be going, then.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I worked really hard to make that. You, um...you
do understand what this means, right?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>D-don't stare at me like that. A-a-anyways, I've
gotta run. Byeeee!

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I made this just for you, <MYNAME>. I hope you
like it...
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>D-don't feel like you have to wait to eat it,
though. You can have it as soon as I go. Bye!

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I made this for you as a token of my thanks for
everything. You can share it with your family,
too.

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I really hope you like it.
<PAGE>
I can make it again, if you do. But anyway, I
need to go. Bye-bye!

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I made this just for you, <MYNAME>. It might
taste a little gamey, but I'm sure it'll be good.
<PAGE>
I look forward to another year with you.
Hopefully we can spend even more time
together.

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
This is a token of my thanks for all that you've
done for me.
<PAGE>
Stop by the Safari again sometime. We'd love to
see you again. Bye-bye!

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
This is a symbol of my thanks, so I hope you
will enjoy it.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>But do keep in mind, it is a dessert, so please
don't eat it all at once. I'd hate to be the cause of
poor dietary choices.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I have made it on the milder side, but do not
take that as an excuse to overindulge.
<PAGE>
You must take care of yourself and watch your
diet at all times. Now then, I must be going.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Consider this a token of my thanks for all you
and your family have done. Please share it with
<CHARANAME0>.
<PAGE>
Now then, I must be going.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm not sure if I made it right, but I hope you like
it. Or at least like surprises.
<PAGE>
Anyway, I should be going.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
I gave it my best shot, so I think it's edible, at
least. No telling how good it is until you try
some, though.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>I-if you don't like it, just throw it away. I won't
mind. A-anyway, I should be going.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's not like this is just for the holiday, but I did
make it as best I could. I hope you and your
family enjoy it. See you.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Huh? Hey! You don't have any space in your
bag! Oh well. I guess I'll just put it right here,
then.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Actually...it seems like your bag is full right
now. Well then, I'll just set it over here. Enjoy it
at your leisure.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Looks like your bag is full, so I'll just put it over
here.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh dear. Your bag is full. I suppose I will set it
over here, then.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Your bag is full. Mind if I just put it here?

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Looks like your bag is full, though. I'll just set it
here for now.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Goodness! Your bag is full. I guess I shall just
have to set it here for the time being. But do not
leave it here! Put it away where it belongs.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh my. Your bag is full. I'll just set it over here,
then.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oops! But your bag is full, so I can't give it to
you. I'll put it over here, then.

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Uh-oh! Your bag is full, so I'll set it over here.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It seems your bag is full. I shall set it here, then.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Thing is, I can't give it to you 'cause your bag is
full. I'll just put it here.
